about_the_game:
King of Retail is back, and it's bigger, better, and more challenging than ever before!
Welcome to the grand re-opening of "King of Retail 2!"

Are you ready to once again step into the shoes of a retail tycoon and build your shopping empire? Then get ready for a retailing adventure like no other!

Take on the role of a retail shop manager and embark on a thrilling journey as you transform a humble store into a bustling retail mecca. But be warned: success in the retail world isn't as easy as it seems. You'll need wit, strategy, and a whole lot of hard work to conquer the marketplace!

EXPANSIVE WORLD:

Explore a vast and diverse city, brimming with potential customers, from fashionistas to foodies, tech geeks to sports enthusiasts. Each customer is unique, and their needs are ever-changing, so adapt and conquer!

HARD WORK PAYS OFF:

Retail isn't just about selling products; it's about connecting with your customers, understanding their desires, and giving them an unforgettable shopping experience. You'll need to roll up your sleeves, multitask, and have the tenacity to build your empire from the ground up!

CURATE YOUR STORE:

Tailor your shop to your liking! Choose from a vast array of products, decor, and layouts. Craft the shopping experience of your customers' dreams, all while making your store stand out from the competition!

MANAGE STAFF:

Hire, train, and lead your dream team of sales experts. Keep them motivated, and watch as they elevate your shop to new heights. Remember, it's a team effort to reach the top!

STRATEGIC DECISIONS:

Will you be the price-slashing discount king, or the high-end luxury boutique? The choice is yours! Adapt to market trends, experiment with promotions, and manage inventory wisely. Profit margins and customer satisfaction are your top priorities!

BUILD A RETAIL EMPIRE:

 As you conquer one store, expand your retail kingdom to multiple locations across the city. It's a juggling act of supply and demand, but you're the king of retail, and you've got this!


King of Retail 2 is not just a game; it's a retail adventure like no other! Get ready to experience the hustle and bustle of the retail world as you build your empire from scratch and strive to be the ultimate King of Retail. Are you up for the challenge?
Grab your virtual shopping cart and start your retail journey today! Are you ready to rule the retail world? The kingdom of shopping awaits you, and the crown of success is within your reach!

Become the retail mastermind you were born to be in King of Retail 2.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060 GTX or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 3060 GTX or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: Ready to build another empire? You are once again back in the role as the manager, trying to make the best of a busy store. Find the right things to sell, get the right employees and turn every stone for a profit. Can you handle the pressure or will you buck under? Welcome to King of Retail 2.
